meanings.definition: To send a message by telegram.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys telegramming her friends on special occasions.
meanings.sent2: He was telegramming his family to inform them of his safe arrival.
meanings.sent3: The cat was telegramming the birds to invite them to a tea party.
meanings.sent4: The flowers seemed to be telegramming each other about the upcoming spring.
meanings.sent5: The old man was telegramming his memories to the younger generation.

meanings.definition: The act of sending a message by telegram.
meanings.sent1: Telegramming was a common way of communication in the past.
meanings.sent2: The telegramming service was efficient and reliable.
meanings.sent3: The children found an old telegramming machine and pretended to send messages.
meanings.sent4: The telegramming of important news spread quickly throughout the town.
meanings.sent5: The telegramming of love letters brought joy to many couples.
